import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import ProgressBar from '../Common/ProgressBar/ProgressBar'; import classes from './Activity.module.css'; import { setCurrentActivity } from '../../Redux/activitiesReducer'; import { NavLink, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; const Activity = (props) => { let widthProgressBar = 83; let heightProgressBar = 16; useEffect(()=>{ let activityId = props.match.params.activityId; console.log(activityId) props.activities.foreach(item => { if(item.id == activityId){ props.setCurrentActivity(item); } }); },[]); return(

Welcome back,

{props.user.fullName}

34 hrs and 54 mins
34 hrs

Programs

View all
78%
42%

Activity details

Private
Cybersecurity awareness > Cybersecurity

{props.activity.title}

{props.activity.time}
); } let WithUrlDataContainerComponent = withRouter(Activity); let mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ isFetching: state.common.isFetching, activity: state.activities.currentActivity, activities: state.activities.activities, user: state.user.user }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, { setCurrentActivity })(WithUrlDataContainerComponent);
